data.title: Top 10 hottest Chinese models with Charismatic personalities
data.meta_description: Top 10 Chinese models with age, height, films, television series, awards, scandals, and personal relations. All these models are highly talented and beautiful.
data.text:
In terms of beauty, the western world is famous all around. But do you know about the eastern beauty? Hopefully, you are not entirely aware of the hottest eastern models in the fashion industry. Especially the Chinese supermodels.

Chinese models have charismatic personalities. They have the sexiest figure, hot body, extremely fair complexion, and physically fit & healthy. Besides this, they are also very diligent and hard-working.

Do you know what factors are considered as most important when it comes to Chinese beauty? Yes! In China, a small face and a pointy chin are essential factors in making your name on the list of beautiful people.

Here I have created a list of the top 10 hottest Chinese models. All of these models are highly talented, and they reflect true Asian beauty. So let’s have a look and check what number your favorite model acquires.

10. Zhang Ziyi:

Zhang is regarded as the Four Dan Actresses of China. She was born on February 9, 1979, in Beijing, China. Her father was an accountant, and her mother was a teacher. Since her childhood, she was very interested in dancing. Later she appeared in multiple T.V. commercials.

Zhang made her acting debut through The Road Home in 1999. Next year in 2000, she worked in Ang Lee’s Crouching Tiger and Hidden Dragon. These projects became the reason for her overnight fame and international recognition.

She also made her appearance in projects like Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, Rush Hour 2, The Legend of Zu, Musa, Hero, My Wife is a Gangster 2, House of Flying Daggers, Sophie’s Revenge, Better and Better, The Crossing Part 1, The Crossing Part 2, The Wasted Times and The Climbers.

This model was ranked at the 5th position in Forbes China Celebrity 100. She is a spokesperson for “Care for Children.” Zhang is also an ambassador on many platforms like Beijing International Film Festival, Chinese Film Days in Romania, Macao Film Festival, and China’s Special Olympics.

In her personal life, Zhang was committed to Aviv Nevo, an Israeli American Venture Capitalist. In 2011, due to some clashes they separated. In 2015 she married Wang Feng, a Chinese musician. Presently the couple has two children.

9. Bianca Bai:

In the field of fashion and glamour, Bianca Bai has her name in the top 10. She was born on October 23, 1982, in Taipei, Taiwan. Her height is 5 ft and 7 in. Bianca started her career as a model through a modeling agency, and later in 2005; she stepped into her acting career.

The first acting project of Bianca is “It Started with a Kiss”. Her other projects are Angel Lover, Fated to Love You, Shining Days, P.S. Man, Soldier, Skip Beat, Loves in Penghu, If I Love You, and Liao Zhai 4. She has also worked in four Chinese films.

For her role in Shinning Days, she is also nominated as the Best Actress. Her name is considered in the list of most beautiful, confident, and sexiest Chinese actress and model.

In her personal life, Bianca Bai married Donald Tong in 2016. The same year couple was blessed with a baby boy.

8. Liu Wen:

With fourteen years in the industry, Luis is now 33. She has her name as a highly paid actress and model in the industry. Her birthplace is Yongzhou, Hunan, China.

Liu started her career through the New Silk Road World model contest, and she won the semi-final. But she was not able to win the final. That time she groomed herself to come up with the real standards.

In 2008 she made her appearance in four fashion-related articles for Chinese Vogue. Liu worked in campaigns like Calvin Klein, Dolce & Gabbana, Oscar de la Renta, Hugo Boss, Marni, Alexander Wang, Rag & Bone, H&M, Lane Crawford, Bergdorf Goodman, Diesel, and Gap.

She is also associated with many famous brands and designers. On her social media account, she has a massive fan following. She is also considered the hottest Chinese model.

Besides this, Liu keeps her personal life away from everyone. She hasn’t disclosed about her lover yet. Instead, in an interview, she said that whoever is interested in her can contact her agent.

7. Chrissie Chau:

Chrissie is a true example of South Asian Beauty. From 2009 to 2012, she won the award of four “Most Searched Photos on Yahoo!”. Chau is famous for her bold pictures and banners for lingerie brands.

Her birthplace is Chaozhou, Guangdong, China, and her birth year is 1985. In her early teens, she worked in a fast-food restaurant. Later in her late teens, she started modeling.

Chau is one of the Hongkong most famous pseudo models. In her filmography career, she worked in Bet to Basic, Nobody’s Perfect, Split Second Murders, City Under Siege, Vampire Warriors, Beach Spike, Are You Ready to Marry Me, Atonement, All’s Well Ends Well 2020, and many more.

In 2009 she was invited as a guest in a seminar aimed at widening students’ horizons. Later she was interviewed by a professor. In an interview, he asked her several knowledge-based questions that she was not able to answer. This issue became a controversy, and everyone criticized her.

6. Lin Chi-ling :

This Chinese actress is now 46 years old and celebrates her birthday on November 29. Lin is not only an actress but also a model, singer, and television host.

On television, Lin started her career through an advertisement. A producer noted her and offered to host a Hong Kong fashion show. The thing that made her overnight star is the giant posters of her face. She became a national star and Celebrity. She is also serving as Taiwan’s goodwill ambassador.

She has done many movies like Red Cliff Part 1 and part 2, The Treasure Hunter, Say Yes!, Hunter, Undercover, Monk Comes Down the Mountain, The Monkey King 3, Embarrassing Way, and many other movies.

In the past, Lin was in a relationship with Jerry Yan, who is an actor. They broke up, and in 2019 Lin announced that she will marry Akira, a Japanese pop band Exile.

5. Lynn Hung:

This beautiful actress and model originally belong from Mainland China. She was born in Nanjing, China, on October 10, 1980. Hung reflects true Asian beauty.

In 1999 Lynn Hung participated in the “China National Model Competition” and ends up as the second runner-up. She has also received the “Best Fashion Model” and “China Top Ten Models.” In 2015 Hung hosted China’s Next Top Model C5. She is very confident and bold.

To date, she has worked in many famous movies like Welcome to Destination Shanghai, Short of Love, All’s Well, Ends Well 2010, My Sassy Girl 2, All’s Well, Ends Well 2012, Hotel Deluxe, Running Man, The Right Mistake, The Last Women Standing, S.M.A.R.T. Chase and Ip Man 4.

Hung was dating Aaron Kwok since 2006. In 2012 when they were engaging together, Kwok’s father died. Later in 2013, due to some reasons, their relationship ended. In 2016 Hung married Ken Kwok after dating him for two years. Presently the couple has two children and spending a happy life.

4. Gaile Lok:

Gaile was born in Macau on August 22, 1980. She was brought up in the U.S.A. With notable features and extraordinary skills, Gaile’s name comes in the top Chinese Models. In 2000, Gaile made her acting debut through “I Do.” Later in 2004, Gaile was seen in “‘ My Sweetie.”

In her personal life, she was dating Leon Lai in 2006, an actor and singer. The same year a magazine published Gaile and Leon intimate pictures at their residence. Leon protested against the magazine. In 2012 they married secretly at a hotel. After four years, they ended up with a divorce.

In 2017, Lok married Ian Chu, a businessman. In 2019 the couple was blessed with a son whose name is Hunter.

3. Du Juan:

Du Juan is a Chinese actress, a ballet dancer, and a model with a height of 5 ft and 11. She was born on September 15, 1982, in Shanghai, China.

She has worked for many prominent industry designers like Valentino, Roberto Cavalli, Jean-Paul Gaultier, and Chanel. Du Juan’s favorite fashion designer is Alber Elbaz. Du Juan made her acting debut through American Dreams in China. It was directed by Peter Chan and became a highly grossed film.

Du Juan is the only East Asian model who made her appearance on the cover of Vogue Paris. She also appeared fourteen times on the Vogue cover of China.

2. Zhang Yuqi:

Zhang Yuqi is also known by the name Kitty Zhang. She was born on August 8, 1986, in Dezhou, Shandong province. Since her childhood, she was interested in acting. At the age of 15, she took acting classes.

Zhang made her acting debut in 2007 through The Longest Night in Shanghai. After this, she appeared in Shaolin Girl, All About Women, Here Comes Fortune, The Butcher, the Chef, the Swordsman, General’s Command, Come Across Love, Legend of the Demon Cat Sexy Guys.

On television, she was seen in Ice Fantasy Destiny, Behind The Scenes. Candle in the Tomb: The Lost Caverns and Cracking Case.

Zhang is a talented actress and sexiest model. She won the best actress award in the 8th Chinese American Film Festival and a best-supporting actress award.

In 2011 Zhang was in a relationship with Wang Quan’an. The same year they married. Unfortunately, due to some clashes, the couple took divorce. In 2016, Zhang married Yuan Bayuan, but after two years, like before, they announced their separation.

1. Fan Bingbing:

Since 2006 Zhang has her name as the highest-paid Celebrity. She is 39 years old but still looks very young and beautiful. Because of her charismatic personality, she is considered a global fashion icon.

The television series My Fair Princess made her a star and Celebrity. In 2000, Fan was seen in “Cell Phone,” one of the highest-grossing films. Her other Chinese movies are Lost in Beijing (2007), Buddha Mountain (2011), Double Xposure (2012), and I Am Not Madame Bovary (2016).

On her excellent work, Fan Bingbing received many awards like Hundred Flowers Awards, Golden Horse Awards, 23rd Tokyo International Film Festival, Beijing College Student Film Festival, Beijing College Student Film Festival, and 11th Asian Film Awards.

In 2015 Fan was dating Li Chen. Li broke this news on his social media account. In 2017 he proposed to Fan at her birthday party, and the couple got engaged. Later they separated in 2019.

Final Words

In the world of the entertainment industry, Chinese models have their significant role. They are not working in China; instead, they are famous internationally. All these are highly paid models in the world.

Presently Chinese models are changing the previous standards of beauty. They are coming up with new looks and styles. They are also representing true Asian beauty by their charming features and hot figures.
